comments: Great Professor. One of the best at Brooklyn college. Took research startegies with him and he is so helpful, even if you are havinf trouble he will help you. He stays late to help students after class and posts materials online to minimize on book costs. He is one prfo that I will remember for my whole life.

this guy is a great prof. makes the class and material fun. maybe not an easy grader but you do the work, you get the grade you deserve. DID I SAY HE WAS HOT TOO? he\'s an eye candy. i\'ll recommend him anytime

Epstein used to teach in Murrow, I had him a few times when I was in high school. He is a great professor and if I had to take a political science class than I would DEFINITELY take it with him. He knows how to teach!!! take him!!! you wont regret it

Professor Epstein is a great professor! He is very creative and even though the class was almost 3 hrs long, he made the class fun. We had newspaper articles, blogs and we focused on the election. He teaches great and he is cute ;) He likes participation and will call on you. He helps you if you need it.Tests are a little hard, gives reviews tho :)
